channel.title: How do i make an object teleport me to 2 different coords without a message?
channel.description: Ive been making a brimhaven dungeon and for every single vines that you gotta cut through, i gotta make a case for it to teleport you to the other side both ways! I wanna make it so it's esiar and just click the vines to go accross and when your on the other side you click it again and you can go to the other side, back where you were before you even clicked on it... If som1 gets this confusing post, plz tell me a void on how to do it, anything!! on making an object do this!!![br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 07:58:26 PM[/size][hr]ok come on plz tell me how or i'll be mad!

item.title: How do i make an object teleport me to 2 different coords without a message?
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

i dont wanna make a portal, i wanna make fight pits with the passage way teles you in the pits if your out and out of pits if you in!!! cmon, ive seen it on soooooo many servers! why cant som1 answer my question right!

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make an object teleport me to 2 different coords without a message?
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

o i see!

EDIT: it doesnt work for me, here’s the code i’m adding:

case 5103: if (actionTimer == 0) { selectoption("What way do you wanna go over vines?", "In area", "Out", ""); OptionObject = objectID; } break;

and ive added the teleports for both options now how do i make it work without the message poppin up which takes a long time (2 seconds) to get to the other side of the vines when i could just click on it and u’ll get there in no time!

Read full topic

it would be like this

case ####: teleportToX: ####; teleportToY: ####; break;
